snippet: Serena Williams is intent on defending her Olympic titles in Rio and finds it sad that several athletes will miss out on an "amazing" experience because of worries about the Zika virus....
lead_paragraph: Serena Williams is intent on defending her Olympic titles in Rio and finds it sad that several athletes will miss out on an "amazing" experience because of worries about the Zika virus.

headline.print_headline: Serena Intent on Defending Olympic Title She Loves
headline.main: Serena Intent on Defending Olympic Title She Loves
